meanings.definition: To apply talcum powder to the body.
meanings.sent1: After showering, she enjoys talcuming her skin to keep it dry.
meanings.sent2: I saw my mom talcuming her feet before putting on her socks.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled as the talcuming turned into a cloud of powder around him.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast's hands were like talcuming clouds as she prepared for her routine.
meanings.sent5: The gentle talcuming of the baby's bottom helped prevent diaper rash.

meanings.definition: The act of sprinkling talcum powder on something.
meanings.sent1: I spilled the talcuming all over the bathroom floor by accident.
meanings.sent2: The gentle talcuming of the baby's bottom helped prevent diaper rash.
meanings.sent3: The talcuming of the cake with powdered sugar made it look like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The talcuming of the field with chalk marked the boundaries for the game.
meanings.sent5: The cloud of talcuming powder hung in the air after the magician's trick.
